programme.title: Snowpiercer
Snowpiercer
programme.desc:
Snowpiercer: Directed by Bong Joon Ho. With Chris Evans, Kang-ho Song, Ed Harris, John Hurt. In a future where a failed climate change experiment has killed all life except for the survivors who boarded the Snowpiercer (a train that travels around the globe), a new class system emerges." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1706620/","name":"Snowpiercer","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ3NzA1MTY3MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNzE2Mzg5MTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"In a future where a failed climate change experiment has killed all life except for the survivors who boarded the Snowpiercer (a train that travels around the globe), a new class system emerges.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1706620/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"harry_tk_yung"},"dateCreated":"2013-12-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"Fusion of art house and mainstream","reviewBody":"After graping the global movie universe's attention with "The host" (2006), Korean director Bong Joon-ho serves up his first offer in the English language with "Snowpiercer", a futuristic, sci-fi fable as well as a hybrid of art house and mainstream thriller.

The micro depiction of the macro human race is through the titular vehicle (literally meant) – a train that circles the post-apocalyptic world, a frozen hell resulted from the backfire of an over-executed maneuver in battling global warming. Secluded from the outer world, the survivors are stratified by social class, the highest at the front (a perpetual-motion engine) and the lowest at the back. The linear (in more ways than one) story is quite simple, the underprivileged bunch at the back fighting its way, car after car, all the way to the front to gain control of their own destiny. Through the allegory progression, the audience witnesses a rich pageantry of environments – rough workplace, lush greenhouse, giant aquarium, plush lounge, and more.

The impressive cast is well assembled. Chris Evans sheds his "All American" heartthrob image to play this perhaps his first heavy-weight role as an earthy leader of the revolution. John Hurt is the semi-disabled wise old man, a rich reservoir of knowledge. Other key members of the group include Jamie Bell as the young follower, Octavia Spencer as a mother searching for a missing child "drafted" by the ruling class for some obscure purpose, and Song Kang-ho as a Korean security expert. The show-stealing personas, however, are on the opposite side. Most delicious is Tilda Swinton, barely recognizable with ingenious makeup (essentially of a dental nature) playing the spokesperson for the dictator. Allison Pill (so impressive as Zelda Fitzgerald in "Midnight in Paris") is another manifestation of eccentricity, a pregnant kindergarten teacher, all sweetness until she produces a gun and starts shooting. The dictator is competently played by Ed Harris.

The movie is quite long (a little over 2 hours) and does not hurry itself as most blockbuster thrillers would do. Instead, it takes its time with careful, well-crafted character development. But it does hold the audience's attention with excellent acting and artsy photography."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":345306,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Drama","Sci-Fi"],"datePublished":"2013-08-01","keywords":"train,perpetual winter,closed ecological system,population control,dystopia","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1214688537","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE5OTYwNjUxNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODc5MTAyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjE5OTYwNjUxNV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODc5MTAyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"In a future where a failed global-warming experiment kills off all life on the planet except for a lucky few that boarded the Snowpiercer, a train that travels around the globe, where a class system evolves.
"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0262635/","name":"Chris Evans"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0068260/","name":"Jamie Bell"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0842770/","name":"Tilda Swinton"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0094435/","name":"Bong Joon Ho"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0364224/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0157434/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0058896/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2441468/","name":"Jacques Lob"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0499429/","name":"Benjamin Legrand"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2440893/","name":"Jean-Marc Rochette"}],"duration":"PT2H6M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Shark Tale
Riba ribi grize rep
programme.desc: Shark Tale: Directed by Bibo Bergeron, Vicky Jenson, Rob Letterman. With Will Smith, Robert De Niro, Renée Zellweger, Jack Black. When a son of a gangster shark boss is accidentally killed while on the hunt, his would-be prey and his vegetarian brother decide to use the incident to their own advantage." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0307453/","name":"Shark Tale","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTMxMjY0NzE2M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTc3ODcyMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"When a son of a gangster shark boss is accidentally killed while on the hunt, his would-be prey and his vegetarian brother decide to use the incident to their own advantage.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0307453/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"TheLittleSongbird"},"dateCreated":"2009-05-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Nice to look at, but I have seen superior animated films...","reviewBody":"I did like Shark Tale, but there is a lot wrong with it. I did think the animation was very nicely done, and I liked the references to Jaws and Godfather. But I do think that Finding Nemo was much better than this. Shark Tale could have been a great film, had it not been devoid of humour and heart. My first problem with the film was Will Smith. He tries to be funny, but as the film progresses, he gets tiresome, and at times you feel like you want to reach into the screen and put a hand over his mouth. There were times when the script was funny, and there were some nice ideas, but the pace of the whole film was uneven. The characters could have been developed a lot more, particularly Lenny(a nice surprise from Jack Black), and whereas there were a number of nice visual jokes, there is some very over-familiar material in the script. Kids may find the sharks a bit frightening, and adults won't find much to enjoy, with the exception of the talented voice cast, such as Angelina Jolie, whose Lola(a very beautiful fish) was one of the better characters, Rennee Zellwegger, who deserved better than she was given and Robert DeNiro, whose shark was just a caricature of the Godfather. Though it is Martin Scorsesse who gives the most entertaining vocal contribution. And I did like the music score. All in all, it is nice to look at, but there are some parts of the film that aren't as interesting as intended. I did like the film, but I was kind of confused at who it was aimed at. 6/10 Bethany Cox.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":176063,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2005-01-12","keywords":"fish,shark,pufferfish,sea turtle,anthropomorphic animal","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Shark Tale","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2072445209","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGFhODYwZjMtMzkwOS00MmMyLTg0MzQtMGZjN2Y1OGU4ODlkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGFhODYwZjMtMzkwOS00MmMyLTg0MzQtMGZjN2Y1OGU4ODlkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Pre, "October 1st""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000226/","name":"Will Smith"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000134/","name":"Robert De Niro"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000250/","name":"Renée Zellweger"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0074426/","name":"Bibo Bergeron"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0421776/","name":"Vicky Jenson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1224299/","name":"Rob Letterman"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0129164/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0819670/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5022110/","name":"Michael J. Wilson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1224299/","name":"Rob Letterman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0042006/","name":"Scott Aukerman"}],"duration":"PT1H30M"}</script><metacontent="

When a son of a gangster shark boss is accidentally killed while on the hunt, his would-be prey and his vegetarian brother decide to use the incident to their own advantage." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0307453/","name":"Shark Tale","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTMxMjY0NzE2M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTc3ODcyMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"When a son of a gangster shark boss is accidentally killed while on the hunt, his would-be prey and his vegetarian brother decide to use the incident to their own advantage.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0307453/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"TheLittleSongbird","dateCreated":"2009-05-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Nice to look at, but I have seen superior animated films...","reviewBody":"I did like Shark Tale, but there is a lot wrong with it. I did think the animation was very nicely done, and I liked the references to Jaws and Godfather. But I do think that Finding Nemo was much better than this. Shark Tale could have been a great film, had it not been devoid of humour and heart. My first problem with the film was Will Smith. He tries to be funny, but as the film progresses, he gets tiresome, and at times you feel like you want to reach into the screen and put a hand over his mouth. There were times when the script was funny, and there were some nice ideas, but the pace of the whole film was uneven. The characters could have been developed a lot more, particularly Lenny(a nice surprise from Jack Black), and whereas there were a number of nice visual jokes, there is some very over-familiar material in the script. Kids may find the sharks a bit frightening, and adults won't find much to enjoy, with the exception of the talented voice cast, such as Angelina Jolie, whose Lola(a very beautiful fish) was one of the better characters, Rennee Zellwegger, who deserved better than she was given and Robert DeNiro, whose shark was just a caricature of the Godfather. Though it is Martin Scorsesse who gives the most entertaining vocal contribution. And I did like the music score. All in all, it is nice to look at, but there are some parts of the film that aren't as interesting as intended. I did like the film, but I was kind of confused at who it was aimed at. 6/10 Bethany Cox.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":176063,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6,"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2005-01-12","keywords":"fish,shark,pufferfish,sea turtle,anthropomorphic animal","trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Shark Tale","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2072445209","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGFhODYwZjMtMzkwOS00MmMyLTg0MzQtMGZjN2Y1OGU4ODlkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMGFhODYwZjMtMzkwOS00MmMyLTg0MzQtMGZjN2Y1OGU4ODlkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Pre, "October 1st"","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000226/","name":"Will Smith","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000134/","name":"Robert De Niro","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000250/","name":"Renée Zellweger"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0074426/","name":"Bibo Bergeron","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0421776/","name":"Vicky Jenson","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1224299/","name":"Rob Letterman"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0129164/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0819670/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm5022110/","name":"Michael J. programme.title: Puss in Boots
Mačak u čizmama
programme.desc: Puss in Boots: Directed by Chris Miller. With Antonio Banderas, Salma Hayek, Zach Galifianakis, Billy Bob Thornton. An outlaw cat, his childhood egg-friend and a seductive thief kitty set out in search for the eggs of the fabled Golden Goose to clear his name, restore his lost honor and regain the trust of his mother and town." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0448694/","name":"Puss in Boots","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTMxMTU5MTY4MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNzgyNjg2NQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"An outlaw cat, his childhood egg-friend and a seductive thief kitty set out in search for the eggs of the fabled Golden Goose to clear his name, restore his lost honor and regain the trust of his mother and town.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0448694/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"tavm"},"dateCreated":"2011-10-29","inLanguage":"English","name":"Puss in Boots is another entertaining Dreamworks animated movie","reviewBody":"From the Shrek movies comes the Puss in Boots character voiced by Antonio Banderas with all the charm one expects from the character with the addition of Kitty Softpaws (Selma Hayek) and Humpty Alexander Dumpty (Zack Galifianakis) also joining for a fun ride of trying to avoid being pursued by Jack (Billy Bob Thornton) and Jill (Amy Sedaris). Many funny scenes and lines but also much dramatically compelling close calls abound especially in 3-D. Many amusing mixups of various fairy tales with "Jack and the Beanstalk" being mostly used as source. If you were among the disappointed (I wasn't by the way) when watching the last 2 Shrek movies, this one may make you forgive the Dreamworks animation factory. So on that note, I highly recommend Puss in Boots.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":152376,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2011-11-16","keywords":"anthropomorphic animal,origin of hero,action hero,action heroine,split screen","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"No. 3","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1870831129","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIyNjM4NzMxNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDU3NjUyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIyNjM4NzMxNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDU3NjUyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"In this early adventure for the sword fighting cat, Puss in Boots teams with mastermind Humpty Dumpty (Zach Galifianakis) and the street-savvy Kitty (Salma Hayek) to steal the famed Goose that lays the Golden Eggs. programme.title: Shrek the Third
Shrek Treći
programme.desc: Shrek the Third: Directed by Chris Miller, Raman Hui. With Mike Myers, Eddie Murphy, Cameron Diaz, Antonio Banderas. Reluctantly designated as the heir to the land of Far, Far Away, Shrek hatches a plan to install the rebellious Artie as the new king while Princess Fiona tries to fend off a coup d'état by the jilted Prince Charming." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0413267/","name":"Shrek the Third","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTgyMjc3ODk2MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwMjY0MjEzMw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Reluctantly designated as the heir to the land of Far, Far Away, Shrek hatches a plan to install the rebellious Artie as the new king while Princess Fiona tries to fend off a coup d'état by the jilted Prince Charming.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0413267/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Lejink"},"dateCreated":"2008-08-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Ogre and out...?","reviewBody":"It took me a while to catch up with the third edition of the money-spinning "Shrek" franchise and I was vaguely aware of a less than positive critical, if not popular response, to it but was pleasantly surprised with the product on show. Okay, it's pick-your-cliché from "the law of diminishing returns", "familiarity breeding contempt" and "too much of a good thing", but hey, I still like these characters and whilst I now would doubt whether the characters and situations can be developed any further at least on the big-screen, it's certainly been one of the better trilogies of recent years. The graphics and animations are as before so good as to make you think you're wearing 3D spex and the story, while contrived (I'm not quite sure how Arthur and the Knights of the Round Table actually qualify as classic children's fairy-tale or cartoon favourites) shares the laughs around before winding up at the by now familiar happy-ending finish with a romp-out to a classic track from yesteryear, this time Sly Stone's funk-tastic "Thank you...". Best moments are the Gingerbread Man's life flashing before him in a (threatened) pre-death moment and the four Disney princesses (plus one ugly step-sister!) giving it some attitude as they find liberation (even burning a bra symbolically, in the process). Best line, as usual, goes to Eddie Murphy's Donkey "I'm being attacked by an ogre - with issues!". There aren't as many outright belly-laughs as in the peerless first "Shrek", you feel that Shrek and Fiona are more bit-players in their own movie (I can't believe I'm humanising animated characters!) and occasionally you're made to wait for the next really good joke (Eric Idle's Merlin and Justin Timberlake's Arthur don't exactly leap off the page/screen either), so yes, this outing of the not-so-jolly green giant, may not be as good as its predecessors but that's down to the lack of surprise at revisiting these stock characters and, heck, they were mighty good predecessors!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":294534,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2007-06-06","keywords":"shrek,king,puss in boots,donkey,kingdom","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Shrek the Third","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1484980505","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmI0NmI0MTItYzIzNy00YzcwLTk3ZmItZDU0MTAyM2JjOGRkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmI0NmI0MTItYzIzNy00YzcwLTk3ZmItZDU0MTAyM2JjOGRkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Alex Pruitt, an 8-year-old boy living in Chicago, must fend off international spies who seek a top-secret computer chip in his toy car." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0119303/","name":"Home Alone 3","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTJhYjVhOWMtYTUyOS00NWM0LThjNzYtZWYxOTkwN2FhODg2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Alex Pruitt, an 8-year-old boy living in Chicago, must fend off international spies who seek a top-secret computer chip in his toy car.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0119303/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"manofhollywood@aol.com"},"dateCreated":"2002-11-05","inLanguage":"English","name":"This movie is not so bad","reviewBody":"Everybody says this movie sucks...i don't think that at all. We can't have kevin forever...he's gotta grow up at some point. This movie was new,fresh,well acted & had good direction. (RAJA GOSNEL)\n\nWAY-TO-GO JOHN HUGHES!!!!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":113101,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.5},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Action","Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"1997-12-12","keywords":"chicken pox,tape over mouth,silicon valley california,silicon valley,hong kong","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Home Alone 3","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2796355865","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2U4Y2Q2ZjQtYWMzNi00NDQzLWJkNDktYWYyYmM1ZDViYTkwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2U4Y2Q2ZjQtYWMzNi00NDQzLWJkNDktYWYyYmM1ZDViYTkwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from 20th Century Fox Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0513281/","name":"Alex D. We can't have kevin forever...he's gotta grow up at some point. That's why it was good to go with a new family that would keep the spirit of home alone alive...remember it's for the kids. plus the bad guys were more advanced then marv & harry (not saying that i didn't like marv & harry) but these guys had high-tec equitment that was pretty cool. This movie was new,fresh,well acted & had good direction. programme.desc: Astérix & Obélix: Mission Cléopâtre: Directed by Alain Chabat. With Gérard Depardieu, Christian Clavier, Jamel Debbouze, Monica Bellucci. Astérix and Obélix go to Egypt to help architect Numérobis who is building a palace for Cleopatra." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0250223/","name":"Astérix & Obélix: Mission Cléopâtre","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2Q3NmUzNjAtM2VjMS00MGU3LWE4YjEtZTM1NDM0YTdlOWRkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODIyOTEyMzY@._V1_.jpg","description":"Astérix and Obélix go to Egypt to help architect Numérobis who is building a palace for Cleopatra.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0250223/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"soringax"},"dateCreated":"2002-02-21","inLanguage":"English","name":"Exclusively French, but Monica is awesome","reviewBody":"You cannot be seeing the same movie if you didn't grow up in France (or spent at least 10 years there, like me). I don't know if it will ever make it outside French cultural borders (I include Belgium and Luxembourg here). You cannot translate its kind of fun - every name is joke (how many people outside Paris would understand the pun in "Couloirdebus", the name of one of the Roman legionnaires ?). However Monica Bel(l?)ucci is so beautiful, I almost forgot to breathe when I saw her.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":51429,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.7},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Adventure","Comedy","Family"],"datePublished":"2002-01-30","keywords":"architect,based on comic book,egypt,druid,cleopatra","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Bande-annonce [OV]","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1979890201","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2YyNTIxYzAtYzg2Yi00YzAyLThmYWEtOGQwYWJmZWU4MjM0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2YyNTIxYzAtYzg2Yi00YzAyLThmYWEtOGQwYWJmZWU4MjM0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXRodW1ibmFpbC1pbml0aWFsaXplcg@@._V1_.jpg","description":""},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000367/","name":"Gérard Depardieu"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0002010/","name":"Christian Clavier"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0213354/","name":"Jamel Debbouze"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0149260/","name":"Alain Chabat"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0028557/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0090290/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0049807/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0331453/","name":"René Goscinny"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0879853/","name":"Albert Uderzo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0149260/","name":"Alain Chabat"}],"duration":"PT1H47M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Kingdom of Heaven
Nebesko kraljevstvo
programme.desc: Kingdom of Heaven: Directed by Ridley Scott. With Martin Hancock, Michael Sheen, Nathalie Cox, Eriq Ebouaney. Balian of Ibelin travels to Jerusalem during the Crusades of the 12th century, and there he finds himself as the defender of the city and its people." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0320661/","name":"Kingdom of Heaven","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BODczYmE3ZDYtZjIwNC00ZTJhLThkMGUtZDcyNzkyNWMyZDNiXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTAwMzUyMzUy._V1_.jpg","description":"Balian of Ibelin travels to Jerusalem during the Crusades of the 12th century, and there he finds himself as the defender of the city and its people.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0320661/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"nikolaijensen"},"dateCreated":"2005-04-27","inLanguage":"English","name":"I saw a press viewing this morning, this is a good film","reviewBody":"First of all, what can beat Gladiator, with lines like "father to a murdered son, husband to a murdered wife", etc. and Russell Crowe chopping off heads. Kingdom of Heaven is a similar heroic fable yet the good and evil polarity is slightly more ambiguous. I would say it was vastly better than Alexander. Ridley Scott's style (cinematography and music) as seen in Black Hawk Down and Gladiator also lend a wonderful historical ambiance. Orlando Bloom does a fine job as the lead, and the French actress is fantastic (and beautiful), but my favorite lead was the Leper King and the wise nobility of his character. The battle scenes are excellent (including one in falling snow in which the snowflakes seem to hang in the air) and the armies look very historically realistic - this is a very good-looking epic. Formulaic perhaps, but well-executed. Kingdom of Heaven made me feel like leaving the "blacksmithy" that is our dull modern urban existence and finding a cause worth fighting for, but Crusades just aren't what they used to be =D","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":278586,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Adventure","Drama"],"datePublished":"2005-05-04","keywords":"crusader,12th century,jerusalem,templar,knights templar","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Kingdom of Heaven","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2492727577","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2M3MmM0NWYtZTQyYi00NzllLTk3YmEtZDMwZDQyZjk2NTM3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2M3MmM0NWYtZTQyYi00NzllLTk3YmEtZDMwZDQyZjk2NTM3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from 20th Century Fox"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0089217/","name":"Orlando Bloom"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1200692/","name":"Eva Green"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000553/","name":"Liam Neeson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000631/","name":"Ridley Scott"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0074212/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0323361/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1184258/","name":"William Monahan"}],"duration":"PT2H24M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Godfather: Part III
Kum 3
programme.desc: The Godfather: Part III: Directed by Francis Ford Coppola. With Al Pacino, Diane Keaton, Talia Shire, Andy Garcia. Follows Michael Corleone, now in his 60s, as he seeks to free his family from crime and find a suitable successor to his empire." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0099674/","name":"The Godfather: Part III","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWFlYWY2YjYtNjdhNi00MzVlLTg2MTMtMWExNzg4NmM5NmEzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMDk5Mzc5MQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Follows Michael Corleone, now in his 60s, as he seeks to free his family from crime and find a suitable successor to his empire.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0099674/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Duck II"},"dateCreated":"1999-10-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Terribly disappointed","reviewBody":"In some ways it was wonderful seeing some of the original cast members (Pacino, Keaton, Shire) reprising their memorable roles. But in a lot of ways this third installment was just not necessary. If it was all about revealing Michael's wounded mind, and ensuring that he was 'punished for his sins', that was done (quite well, and in a much less graphic way) in Part II: You could tell he was undone in the very last scene. Part III was just overkill.\n\nThere were a few casting problems, as well. Sofia Coppola was just terrible, absolutely painful to watch. George Hamilton made the film look like a made-for-TV movie every time he appeared: What was he doing there?? I sure did miss Robert Duvall! The saving graces were Talia Shire as Connie getting her chance to dominate. Andy Garcia, though he didn't have the opportunity to really take off, was a lot of fun to watch."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":379381,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"1990-12-25","keywords":"opera,gangster,catholic church,violence,organized crime","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1237827865","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDYyZmQyMjMtMGQyMS00YjYwLWIxZWEtMzQ0ODNlYzFkM2YyXkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZDYyZmQyMjMtMGQyMS00YjYwLWIxZWEtMzQ0ODNlYzFkM2YyXkEyXkFqcGdeQWRvb2xpbmhk._V1_.jpg","description":"See the never-before-seen version of the final film, The #GodfatherCoda: The Death of Michael Corleone. Newly re-edited with restored picture and sound, experience the filmmaker’s true vision for the conclusion of the most celebrated saga in cinema history. In select theaters starting December 4."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000199/","name":"Al Pacino"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000473/","name":"Diane Keaton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000412/","name":"Andy Garcia"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000338/","name":"Francis Ford Coppola"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0035894/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0701374/","name":"Mario Puzo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000338/","name":"Francis Ford Coppola"}],"duration":"PT2H42M"}</script><metacontent="

In select theaters starting December 4.","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000199/","name":"Al Pacino","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000473/","name":"Diane Keaton","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000412/","name":"Andy Garcia"],"director":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000338/","name":"Francis Ford Coppola"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0035894/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0701374/","name":"Mario Puzo","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000338/","name":"Francis Ford Coppola"],"duration":"PT2H42M"</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Snatch
Zdrpi i briši
programme.desc:
Snatch: Directed by Guy Ritchie. With Ade, William Beck, Andy Beckwith, Ewen Bremner. Unscrupulous boxing promoters, violent bookmakers, a Russian gangster, incompetent amateur robbers and supposedly Jewish jewelers fight to track down a priceless stolen diamond." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0208092/","name":"Snatch","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTA2NDYxOGYtYjU1Mi00Y2QzLTgxMTQtMWI1MGI0ZGQ5MmU4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDk3NzU2MTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"Unscrupulous boxing promoters, violent bookmakers, a Russian gangster, incompetent amateur robbers and supposedly Jewish jewelers fight to track down a priceless stolen diamond.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0208092/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Shiva-11"},"dateCreated":"2001-01-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Lock, Stock, and Many Smoking Barrels","reviewBody":"The release of Tarantino's "Pulp Fiction" in 1994 prompted a schism in the staid gangster movie genre: the standard hallmarks - serious characters, gunfights, intrigue and damsels in distress - were enhanced with snappy dialogue, and gallows humour. The biggest change however was the introduction of the mobius strip-style plot line, where the concept of time is no longer linear, instead constantly folding in upon itself, flitting between past, present and future that forces the viewer to pay close attention lest they miss some subtle detail. Inevitably, numerous copycat films emerged that tried to capitalize on Tarantino's success, but it wasn't until 1998 when Guy Ritchie, an unknown British director, took on the challenge that a successor was found. Now Ritchie is determined to prove that his first time out wasn't a fluke.

Turkish is a young man with an entrepreneurial bent, who, when he's not running his gambling operation, manages bareknuckle boxers. Through a business deal gone wrong, he becomes acquainted with one Mickey O'Neil, a mumbling manic motor-mouthed piker who also happens to be a one-punch marvel. Turkish persuades Mickey to join his stable of fighters, but soon discovers that Mickey has his own agenda, and gets Turkish in trouble with the gangsters who run the underground boxing circuit. Other characters that become involved in the drama include a four-fingered degenerate gambler/jewel thief, a vicious boxing promoter, a gang of inept robbers, a polite hitman, a crazed Russian gun runner, a group of Irish gypsies, a crooked New York jeweler and a pugnacious pet. The common thread binding them all is a perfect diamond the size of a peach pit. If you aren't confused yet, you soon will be.

"Lock, Stock and Two Smoking Barrels", Mr. Madonna's (Ritchie) first film, was shot on a small budget, with a no-name cast (except for football bad boy Vinnie Jones) and quickly became a rousing success at home and found receptive audiences abroad. While not a technically a sequel "Snatch" is stylistically very similar to "Lock, Stock ": Ritchie utilizes his trademark bombastic staccato sequences, and repeatedly bounces off on radical tangents to throw the viewer off balance. He did however opt for a decidedly darker satirical tone in this film, that may make some people uncomfortable (think "Very Bad Things"). What struck me as particularly daring was his decision to create a story with such a voluminous cast.

 Ritchie faced a daunting task with this film: how, with roughly twenty principal characters, does one adequately flesh out each character, and not hopelessly confuse the audience? The feat was made doubly difficult, as several cast members are big name stars. Somehow Ritchie manages - each actor is full bodied, receives ample screen time, and no one character is the centerpiece. With so many talented actors, it is difficult to pick out one performance that stands out: Rade Serbedzija is hilarious as the mad Russian who blithely burns through each of his nine lives, as is Vinnie Jones' manic gentleman hitman. On the other end of the spectrum, is Alan Ford as Brick Top, the promoter with a penchant for pigs, who epitomizes cold-blooded viciousness. If forced to pick my favorite however, I would have to go with Brad Pitt

Pitt resurrects his trailer trash look from "Kalifornia" and adopts a nearly indecipherable brogue that sounds like my best friend's Uncle Wally on a bad day. As Mickey O'Neil, the hard drinking wily grifter and part-time pugilist, Pitt displays a wide range of emotions, demonstrating again that he is not only a star, but also a gifted character actor. And I would be remiss if I didn't mention the dog that subtly stole every scene he appeared in.

While "Snatch" initially struggles to find its stride, and is very similar to Ritchie's earlier film, it is fresh and funny enough to make you forget any minor shortfalls and stand on its own.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":820877,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.2},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Crime"],"datePublished":"2000-09-01","keywords":"diamond,boxer,narrated by character,fight,boxing","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Snatch","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1558577433","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGU4YzdkNmQtMjJjMS00MDA4LTkwYWUtYjNiNDNhMDMzZDcwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOGU4YzdkNmQtMjJjMS00MDA4LTkwYWUtYjNiNDNhMDMzZDcwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Screen Gems"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005458/","name":"Jason Statham"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000093/","name":"Brad Pitt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0334318/","name":"Stephen Graham"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005363/","name":"Guy Ritchie"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0050868/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000750/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005363/","name":"Guy Ritchie"}],"duration":"PT1H44M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Legends of the Fall
Legenda o jeseni
programme.desc:
Legends of the Fall: Directed by Edward Zwick. With Brad Pitt, Anthony Hopkins, Aidan Quinn, Julia Ormond. In the early 1900s, three brothers and their father living in the remote wilderness of Montana are affected by betrayal, history, love, nature, and war." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0110322/","name":"Legends of the Fall","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTYwMjYxNTAyN15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMTc3MjkyMTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"In the early 1900s, three brothers and their father living in the remote wilderness of Montana are affected by betrayal, history, love, nature, and war.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0110322/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"epat"},"dateCreated":"2004-03-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Moved me like no film I've seen in a long damn time!","reviewBody":"I watch a lot of movies & I can't remember the last time a film held me so spellbound. Not only are the characters engaging & vividly portrayed by an excellent cast, the subtle dynamics of their interactions are portrayed with inspired undertone & nuance. Star billing or even an Oscar should also have been awarded to the spectacularly beautiful scenery of Montana for the vast majesty it bestowed.

This complex saga of love, grief & loyalty is narrated with stark simplicity by old Stab, long-time friend to retired Colonel Ludlow & his 3 sons: staid Alfred, the eldest ("old even for his years"); idealistic Samuel, the youngest ("There was nothing these brothers would not do for him."); & wild Tristan ("Such people become crazy or they become legends."). The conflict between Ludlow's fiercely anti-government anti-war stance & his sons' determination to do what they see as their duty is but a small part of the story; the heart of the tale is the rift that threatens the mutual devotion of these 3 loyal brothers as they all come to love the same woman. "She was not to blame," Stab tells us, "She was like the ice that freezes in the rock and splits it apart."

A tragic tale, yes; heartbreaking at times, but never boring. Every time I felt certain I knew what was coming next, the plot took another unexpected turn & I sat there riveted, softly breathing "Wow!" now & again into the darkness. This film immediately became one of my all-time favorites; I've watched it half a dozen times since then & its scope & power never fail to move me.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":158658,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.5},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Drama","Romance","War"],"datePublished":"1995-01-13","keywords":"f word,no opening credits,violence,sex scene,sexual positions","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Legends of the Fall","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4019519769","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzE3ODUxY2UtMzc0NS00YTc0LThjZGMtOGFiODdkODk4MTBhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMzE3ODUxY2UtMzc0NS00YTc0LThjZGMtOGFiODdkODk4MTBhXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Sony Pictures Home Entertainment"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000093/","name":"Brad Pitt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000164/","name":"Anthony Hopkins"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001644/","name":"Aidan Quinn"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001880/","name":"Edward Zwick"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005883/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0014925/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0049012/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0793463/","name":"Susan Shilliday"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0937074/","name":"William D. Wittliff"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0365659/","name":"Jim Harrison"}],"duration":"PT2H13M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Bad Santa 2
Zločesti Djed Mraz 2
programme.desc: Bad Santa 2: Directed by Mark Waters. With Billy Bob Thornton, Kathy Bates, Tony Cox, Christina Hendricks. Fueled by cheap whiskey, greed and hatred, Willie teams up once again with his angry little sidekick, Marcus, to knock off a Chicago charity on Christmas Eve." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1798603/","name":"Bad Santa 2","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjM2MjE5Mzc4OF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjc3NjEyMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Fueled by cheap whiskey, greed and hatred, Willie teams up once again with his angry little sidekick, Marcus, to knock off a Chicago charity on Christmas Eve.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1798603/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Special-K88"},"dateCreated":"2016-11-24","inLanguage":"English","name":"Bad Decision","reviewBody":"Strained black comedy sequel reunites--for no reason that really makes any sense--Willie, the world's most vile Santa and his foulmouthed, feisty dwarf sidekick Marcus for yet another score, this time at a Chicago charity event on Christmas Eve. That darn kid returns, only this time he's a man (sort of), and as what's supposed to be an added bonus: Willie's equally crass mother (Bates, though even she is helpless against this flimsy material). Unnecessary, uninspired, and untimely follow-up doesn't have much of a plot to keep it afloat, playing mostly as an exercise in unfunny jokes, profane dialogue, and bodily fluids. Forced and forgettable, worth a few fleeting chuckles thanks to a well-chosen cast that elevates it as much as they possibly can. **"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":24827,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Comedy","Crime","Drama"],"datePublished":"2016-11-23","keywords":"santa claus character,ex convict,fired from the job,santas fighting,robbery","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4187403801","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMyMzA5OTEyNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjI4MjIxMDI@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjMyMzA5OTEyNl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMjI4MjIxMDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Fueled by cheap whiskey, greed and hatred, Willie teams up once again with his angry little sidekick, Marcus, to knock off a Chicago charity on Christmas Eve."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000671/","name":"Billy Bob Thornton"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000870/","name":"Kathy Bates"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0185272/","name":"Tony Cox"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0914132/","name":"Mark Waters"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0471578/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0209925/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022594/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1752051/","name":"Johnny Rosenthal"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0189272/","name":"Shauna Cross"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0275629/","name":"Glenn Ficarra"}],"duration":"PT1H32M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Tangled
Vrlo zapetljana priča
programme.desc:
Tangled: Directed by Nathan Greno, Byron Howard. With Mandy Moore, Zachary Levi, Donna Murphy, Ron Perlman. The magically long-haired Rapunzel has spent her entire life in a tower, but now that a runaway thief has stumbled upon her, she is about to discover the world for the first time, and who she really is." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0398286/","name":"Tangled","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTAxNDYxMjg0MjNeQTJeQWpwZ15BbWU3MDcyNTk2OTM@._V1_.jpg","description":"The magically long-haired Rapunzel has spent her entire life in a tower, but now that a runaway thief has stumbled upon her, she is about to discover the world for the first time, and who she really is.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0398286/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"maestro-20"},"dateCreated":"2010-11-25","inLanguage":"English","name":"Disney's back with their fairytale","reviewBody":"I was apprehensive, to say the least, when I went to see Tangled, after the disappointment that was Princess and the Frog. First, Disney's back with CGI animation, which hasn't really worked that great except, maybe to some extent, Bolt. Second, the trailers made it look really slapstick -- I'm rather wary of today's animation features that try too hard to be hip and fast-paced and silly.

I was pleasantly surprised. Sure, there were slapstick and broad humor sure to make little kiddos laugh. But I was surprised by the sophistication as well. The screwball comedy between the hero and heroine is very well done; adults can appreciate that. The sidekicks, in particular the Max and Pascal, are hilarious. The hero and heroine are very likable and not flat. And there's a sense of sadness/wistfulness throughout the whole show that the adults will understand.

But what really is great is the animation. This is Pixar-worthy great. In fact, after a while I forgot it was CGI (which tends to be a bit stiff and crude when it comes to character animation). The human characters have that hand-drawn quality even though they're CG. In fact, they're more expressive than the hand-drawn characters in Princess and the Frog. The backgrounds are gorgeous (I can count every blade of grass). And there's an iconic scene where the kingdom rouses from darkness to light with thousands of floating lanterns -- it really is magical. It reminds me of classics such as Beauty and the Beast and Sleeping Beauty.

Best of all, the movie is not just all laughs and slapstick. It has heart too. Even the minor characters such as the King and Queen -- you can feel the emotions. And the romance is believable and not cheesy.

Like I said, I was very pleasantly surprised. It's something that is worthy of Pixar, and I'm glad to see Disney back on their game. While Princess and the Frog was a missed opportunity, Tangled is almost perfect.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":428452,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2010-12-01","keywords":"rapunzel,based on fairy tale,disney,flower,female protagonist","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Tangled: Trailer #2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi385091865","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkxMzI2NDA5MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTE1OTYzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTkxMzI2NDA5MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNTE1OTYzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"The long-haired Princess Rapunzel has spent her entire life in a tower, but when she falls in love with a bandit who was passing by she must venture into the outside world for the first time to find him."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0601553/","name":"Mandy Moore"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1157048/","name":"Zachary Levi"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0614220/","name":"Donna Murphy"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1977355/","name":"Nathan Greno"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0397174/","name":"Byron Howard"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0074039/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008970/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1557594/","name":"Dan Fogelman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0342278/","name":"Jacob Grimm"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0342303/","name":"Wilhelm Grimm"}],"duration":"PT1H40M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Ice Age: Directed by Chris Wedge, Carlos Saldanha. With Ray Romano, John Leguizamo, Denis Leary, Goran Visnjic. The story revolves around sub-zero heroes: a woolly mammoth, a saber-toothed tiger, a sloth and a prehistoric combination of a squirrel and rat, known as Scrat." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0268380/","name":"Ice Age","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMmYxZWY2NzgtYzJjZC00MDFmLTgxZTctMjRiYjdjY2FhODg3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNjk1Njg5NTA@._V1_.jpg","description":"The story revolves around sub-zero heroes: a woolly mammoth, a saber-toothed tiger, a sloth and a prehistoric combination of a squirrel and rat, known as Scrat.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0268380/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"lynzee"},"dateCreated":"2002-03-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"Charming","reviewBody":"I saw the movie with two grown children. There parents also seemed engaged. The death and apparent death of characters brought about the appropriate gasps and comments. Hopefully people realize this movie was made for kids. As such, it was successful although I liked it too. programme.title: The Bourne Identity
Bornov identitet
programme.desc:
The Bourne Identity: Directed by Doug Liman. With Matt Damon, Franka Potente, Chris Cooper, Clive Owen. A man is picked up by a fishing boat, bullet-riddled and suffering from amnesia, before racing to elude assassins and attempting to regain his memory." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0258463/","name":"The Bourne Identity","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BM2JkNGU0ZGMtZjVjNS00NjgyLWEyOWYtZmRmZGQyN2IxZjA2XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTIzOTk5ODM@._V1_.jpg","description":"A man is picked up by a fishing boat, bullet-riddled and suffering from amnesia, before racing to elude assassins and attempting to regain his memory.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0258463/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"CAMACHO-4"},"dateCreated":"2005-10-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"One of the best spy films around","reviewBody":"This story has been done several times in the past, most recently in "A Long Kiss Goodnight". It's also true that Doug Liman and the producers created their own Jason Bourne mythology,since this movie is different in many ways to the book. But the truth is Liman takes an old story and puts a new fast paced spin on it.

Matt Damon stars as the enigmatic assassin who just wants to figure out who he is. As he travels from city to city he's followed by CIA agents who want to dispose of him to save their own jobs. He's helped along the way by Marie played by the brilliant Franka Potente. Together they come face to face with the people that want them dead.

The cast is great and so is the story. Matt Damon stars as the enigmatic assassin who just wants to figure out who he is. As he travels from city to city he's followed by CIA agents who want to dispose of him to save their own jobs. Panic Room: Directed by David Fincher. With Jodie Foster, Kristen Stewart, Forest Whitaker, Dwight Yoakam. A divorced woman and her diabetic daughter take refuge in their newly-purchased house's safe room, when three men break-in, searching for a missing fortune." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0258000/","name":"Panic Room","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNmY4ZGFjYTYtMDNmYi00ZDM4LWFjYTgtNmNlZjBmMzg0MzQ3XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDk3NzU2MTQ@._V1_.jpg","description":"A divorced woman and her diabetic daughter take refuge in their newly-purchased house's safe room, when three men break-in, searching for a missing fortune.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0258000/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"MDP1970"},"dateCreated":"2002-07-10","inLanguage":"English","name":"Very good thriller","reviewBody":"This movie kept me at the edge of my seat from 10 minutes inside of it and all through until its very end. programme.title: Mbreti i Skocisë
programme.desc: I rrahur dhe i përndjekur nga mbështetësi e Kurorës Britanike, Mbreti i Skocisë strehohet nga një familje e thjeshtë, ku gjen vendosmërinë për të mbledhur popullin e tij dhe për ta udhëhequr të luftojë për pavarësi.
programme.category: Aksion
histori

programme.title: Policë e grabitës
programme.desc: Një negociator pengjesh përpiqet të arrijë një marrëveshje me një hajdut bankash. Por qëllimi i grabitësit, nuk është vetëm të shpëtojë paq, por edhe të turpërojë negociatorin, që eshtë vëllai i tij.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Rojtarët e fuqisë
programme.desc: Bazuar ne serialin mjaft të suksesshëm me të njëjtin titull. Një grup adoleshentësh, të cilët fitojnë fuqi të jashtëzakonshme, duhet të përdorin aftësitë e tyre për të shpëtuar botën nga një kërcënim jashtëtokësor.
programme.category: Aksion
aventurë
fantashkencë

programme.title: Shpërblesa e milionerëve
programme.desc: Jeremy Sumpter, Phoebe Tonkin. Disa të rinj në një shkollë për të reformuar fëmijët rebelë të njerëzve të pasur, detyrohen të marrin ligjin në duar te veta, kur shkolla merret peng nga një grup kriminal.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Ngjitja e Jupiterit
programme.desc: Mila Kunis, Channing Tatum. Një gjuetar i modifikuar gjenetikisht, i tregon nje vajze të zakonshme se ajo është trashëgimtarja e diçkaje të jashtëzakonshme, që mund të ndryshojë balancë e kozmosit.
programme.category: Aksion
fantashkencë

programme.title: Avioni presidencial
programme.desc: Harrison Ford, Gary Oldman. Kandidat për 2 Çmime Oskar. Disa persona rrëmbejnë avioni e presidentit të SHBA-ve dhe mbajnë peng familjen e tij, por ai, një ushtarak i zoti, punon në fshehtësi për të asgjësuar planin e tyre.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Qyteti i krimit
programme.desc: Chadwick Boseman. Pasi një bastisje përfundon me vrasje policësh, një detektiv i rreptë urdhëron bllokimin e të gjitha hyrje-daljeve të Manhatanit. Kërkimi i ethshëm për dy vrasësit zbulon një komplot të papritur.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Casino Royal
programme.desc: Daniel Craig, Eva Green. Me licencen e re për të vrarë marre nga MI-6, agjenti sekret Bond përballet me bankierin e lig, Le Chiffre, i cili për të mbledhur fonde per terrorizmin, organizon nje loje pokeri ne Kazino Rojal ne Mal te Zi.
programme.category: Aksion
aventurë

programme.title: Titanët e Paqësorit 2:Rebelimi
programme.desc: 2018. Me John Boyega. Piloti rebel Xheik Pentekost do të bashkojë forcat me hakeren 15-vjeçare dhe me ish-kolegun e tij, kundër një kërcënimi të ri alien. Ata do ta çojnë në një shkallë tjetër këte aventurë spektakolare.
programme.category: Fantashkencë

programme.title: Die hard II
programme.desc: Brus Willis ne rolin e nje dedektivi te paepur Nju Jorkez, perhere i pranishem ne situatat me te veshtira, ndermarres i sfidave te medha, gjithmonee ne emer te drejtesise, ne mbrojtje te jeteve te pafajshme.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Bota Xhurasik
programme.desc: 2015. 22 vite pas Parkut Xhurasik, është hapur Bota Xhurasik dhe shkencëtarët kanë krijuar gjenetikisht një race të re dinozaurësh. Por kur gjërat shkojnë tmerrësisht keq, fati i gjithë turistëve është në duart e një eksperti kafshësh...
programme.category: Fantashkencë
aventurë

programme.title: Muri i Madh
programme.desc: 2016.Matt Damon, Tian Jing, Willem Dafoe. Dy mercenarë në kërim të barutit, e gjejnë veten të përfshirë në mbrojtjen e 'Murit të Madh' në Kinë që po sulmohet nga ushtri gjigante përbindëshish.
programme.category: Aksion
fantazi

programme.title: Labirinti - Vrapo ose vdis
programme.desc: Dylan O'Brien, Aml Ameen. Kur Tomasi, nje djalë i ri zgjohet brenda një labrinti vdekjepruës, ai nuk mban mend asgjë përveçse disa ëndrrave të çuditshme. Tani ai duhet të përpiqet të zbulojë të vërtetën dhe të dalë gjallë prej aty...
programme.category: Aksion
thriller
fantashkencë

programme.title: Deni qeni
programme.desc: Me skenar të Luc Besson vjen historia e një skllavi modern. Një njeri, që në vegjeli, i rritur si një qen besnik, i shndërruar në një makineri lufte duke njohur veç dhunë dhe urrejtje, do të arratiset nga padroni i tij për të nisur një jetë të re.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Mbreti majmun 2
programme.desc: 500 vite pas ngjarjeve në filmin e parë, një murg në kërkim të disa shkrimeve të shenjta, çliron padashje Mbretin Majmun. Kur një demon në kërkim të përjetësisë u vihet pas, Mbreti Majmun bën të pamundurën për të mbrojtur murgun dhe njerëzimin.
programme.category: Aksion
fantazi
aventurë

programme.title: Bombarduesi
programme.desc: Jeff Bridges. Një terrorist irlandez do të tentoje hakmarrjen me gjithë fuqinë shperthyese të teknikave të tij. Do të arratiset nga burgu dhe do të shpërngulet fshehurazi në Boston, ku do t'i vihet pas një ish-armiku të vjetër.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Qeni i egër
programme.desc: Scott Adkins. Një ish-boksier i burgosur në burgun më të rrezikshëm të Indokinës, ka vënë emër duke fituar kampionate të jashtligjshme në burg. Kur bëhet gati për t'u liruar, ata që drejtojnë burgun do të bëjnë çmos për ta mbajtur brenda.
programme.category: Aksion

programme.title: Njerëz të zakonshëm
programme.desc: Pasi fillon punë si mësues fizkulture në gjimnazin e një qyteti të qetë rural, një ish - trajner boksi përfshihet në rastin e zhdukjes së një nxënëseje, që çuditërisht nuk shqetëson vendasit dhe autoritetet.
programme.category: Aksion
krim

programme.title: Engjëjt e Carlit 2
programme.desc: Treshja e mrekullueshme Cameron Diaz, Drew Barrymore dhe Lucy Liu rikthehet! Mjeshtret edhe kesaj radhe do te jene armike te betuara te krimit e padrejtesise.
programme.category: Aventure
aksion

programme.title: Robin hud
programme.desc: 2010. Fituesi i çmimit Oskar, Russell Crowe dhe regjisori Ridley Scott, sjellin historinë e njeriut që u bë legjendë. Një njeri sfidon tiraninë e mbretit dhe kthehet në një hero të jashtëligjshëm, që ndryshonpërgjithmonë historinë e një kombi.
programme.category: Aksion
aventurë

programme.title: Star Trek
programme.desc: (2009)Kandidat për 4 Çmime Oskar dhe 7 çmime të tjera kinematografike. Fati i galaksisë është në duart e 2 rivalëve të betuar! Njëri është Xhejms Kirku, kriminel aventurier, dhe tjetri Spoku, i rritur në një shoqëri të bazuar në logjikë.

programme.title: Die hard III

programme.title: Vrasësja Meri
programme.desc: Taraji P. Henson. Meri është një vrasëse profesioniste e cila punon për një familje kriminale në Boston. Jeta e saj ndryshon rrënjesisht kur detyrohet të kujdeset për një djalë të vogël, pasi një punë shkon keq.
programme.category: Aksion
thriller

programme.title: Tri ditët e fundit

horror

programme.title: Hëna
programme.desc: Ndërkohë që kontratës së tij 3 vjeçare si minator në Hënë po i vjen fundi, njeriu i vetëm (Sam Rockwell) që ndodhet aty, bën një zbulim që vendos në dilemë gjithçka që ai ka njohur deri më tani...
programme.category: Fantashkencë

programme.title: Rendi i ri botëror
programme.desc: Ndërsa grupi më i madh kriminal Korean zgjeron pushtetin, agjenti Ja-Seoung dërgohet të infiltrohet në grupin e tyre. Pas disa kohësh me ta, atij i duhet të zgjedhjë të ndjekë urdhërat e policisë, apo t'i qëndrojë besnik bandës.
programme.category: Krim
dramë

programme.title: Fëmijët
programme.desc: Pushimet e shumëpritura kthehen në një makth të vërtetë për mbijetesë, kur fëmijët fillojnë të masakrojnë prindërit e tyre në mënyra të tmerrshme.
programme.category: Horror

programme.title: Të mallkuarit
programme.desc: Regjia: Wes Craven; Aktorët: Christina Ricci, Joshua Jackson. Një grup të rinjsh e gjejnë veten të mbërthyer në një tmerr të paimagjinueshëm-dy nga vajzat kafshohen nga një kafshë misterioze dhe në ditët në vijim ndryshojnë sjellje.
programme.category: Horror

programme.title: Gjahtarët e demonëve: Qyteti i eshtrave
programme.desc: Lily Collins. Pas zhdukjes së të ëmës, një adoleshente njujorkeze zbulon se është pasardhëse e një linje luftëtarësh që mbrojnë botën nga demonët. Kur bashkon forcat me ta, ajo njeh një botë paralele mbushur me krijesa të rrezikshme...
programme.category: Fantazi
Aksion
Horror

programme.title: Pushteti i pestë
programme.desc: Benedict Cumberbatch, Daniel Brühl. Kjo është historia e vërtetë sesi krijuesit e WikiLeaks, Julian Assange dhe Daniel Berg rrezikuan jetët e tyre dhe të shumë njerëzve të tjerë, për të nxjerrë në shesh të vërtetën...
programme.category: Biografi

programme.title: Super 8
programme.desc: Një bashkëpunim i J.J. Abrams me Steven Spielberg. Në verën e vitit 1979, një grup miqsh bëhen dëshmitarë të një aksidenti me tren. Shumë shpejt ata kuptojnë që çfarëdo që ka shpëtuar, është shumë më e tmerrshme se ç'mund të imagjinohet.
programme.category: Mister
fantashkencë

programme.title: Pajisja Fantazmë
programme.desc: Me E.Harris, D.Duchovny. Në kulmin e Luftës së Ftohtë, një nëndetëse ruse e armatosur me raketa nukelare, zhduket ne oqeanin Paqësor. Në bordin e saj, një kapiten veteran dhe një agjent i KGB-së, ndodhen në një betejë për jetë a vdekje...
programme.category: Thriller

programme.title: Libri i shenjtë
programme.desc: Denzel Washington, Gary Oldman. Një hero në një botë post-apokaliptike, në një udhëtim epik përmes Amerikës në mbrojtje të një libri të shenjtë ku shkruhen sekretet për shpëtimin e të gjithë racës njerëzore...
programme.category: Aventurë

programme.title: Korridori i errët
programme.desc: 2018. Anna Sophia Robb, Uma Thurman. Një adoleshente problematike dërgohet në një shkollë ekskluzive me konvikt, ku aftësitë e jashtëzakontëshme të studentëve vijnë më në kosto të mbinatyrshme...
programme.category: Horror
fantazi

programme.title: Heshtja para stuhisë
programme.desc: 2019. Matthew McConaughey, Anne Hathaway, Diane Lane. Kapiteni i një anije peshkimi përballet me një dileme morale, kur ish-bashkëshortja rishfaqet dhe i përgjërohet që të vrasë bashkëshortin e saj abuziv.
programme.category: Thriller
drame

programme.title: Në periferi
programme.desc: Një djalë i ri detyrohet të kujdeset për motrat e tij të vogla pasi e ëma burgoset për vrasjen e babait të tyre abuzues. Por kur ai nis një lidhje me një grua të martuar, sekrete familjare të fshehura prej kohësh, fillojnë të dalin në sipërfaqe...
programme.category: Thriller
dramë

programme.desc:
300: Directed by Zack Snyder. With Gerard Butler, Lena Headey, Dominic West, David Wenham. King Leonidas of Sparta and a force of 300 men fight the Persians at Thermopylae in 480 B.C." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0416449/","name":"300","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNWMxYTZlOTUtZDExMi00YzZmLTkwYTMtZmM2MmRjZmQ3OGY4XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTAwMzUyMzUy._V1_.jpg","description":"King Leonidas of Sparta and a force of 300 men fight the Persians at Thermopylae in 480 B.C.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0416449/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"rogerdarlington"},"dateCreated":"2007-03-30","inLanguage":"English","name":"Thrilling blood-fest","reviewBody":"The 480 BC Battle of Thermopylae is the stuff of military legend when, in popular lore, a mere 300 Spartans commanded by King Leonidas held off a Persian force led by Xerxes the Great that Herodotus claimed as 2.6 million. In truth, the Spartans were backed by a mixed force of almost 7,000, while there are enormous variations in modern estimates of the multi-ethnic Persian army, but somewhere between 100,000-200,000 seems realistic. Whatever the actual figures, the odds against the Spartans were terrible, death was inevitable, and their honour secure.

The story was first told on film in 1962 when director Rudolph Maté went to Greece and shot a worthy, but conventional and surprisingly leaden, version entitled "The 300 Spartans", starring American Richard Egan as King Leonidas and the British David Farrar as Xerxes. "300" takes the same basic narrative and presents it in an utterly different style in a blood-fest when "The Wild Bunch" meets "Kill Bill" and the visuals are like nothing except "Sin City". This time the director is Zack Snyder, known for his music videos, and the location is a studio set in Montreal with green backgrounds later filled by superb computer-generated graphics and the whole storybook style is based on the graphic novel by co-producer Frank Miller. Both versions use the legendary exchange: "When we attack today, our arrows will blot out the sun!" "Good; then we will fight in the shade." But only "300" has such fun lines as: "Spartans! Enjoy your breakfast, for tonight we dine in Hell!" 

Ever since its first public showing at the Berlin Film Festival, most critics have mauled "300" and it presents an easy target for those wanting something more cerebral: there is virtually no plot or characterisation, the script is sparse and bland, much of the acting is exaggerated and over-loud, when it is not homo-erotic it is oddly camp, and the whole thing is stereotypical when it is not outright xenophobic and politically incorrect. And yet, as entertainment, it has much to offer: the sepia-tinged visuals are absolutely stunning and the fight sequences viscerally exciting. I was fortunate enough to see it in IMAX and I regularly felt blood-splattered and exhausted and quite ready to leap into the action.

There are no big names in the cast list which helps the sense of history but does not raise the thespian talent quotient. Gerard Butler plays King Leonidas with a Scottish accent, while the Brazilian Rodrigo Santoro is a version of Xerxes bejewelled with ethnic metalwork. Most of the warriors are literally larger than life: the actors playing the Spartans reveal most of their bodies with digitally-enhanced muscles, while on Xerxes' side characters include a huge hunchback, a giant emissary and a claw-armed executioner as well the metal-masked Immortals. This is before we get on to an enormous raging rhino and bedecked elephants. Truly this is a battle with a circus-like cast. The love interest comes from the feisty wife of Leonidas, Queen Gorgo, portrayed by the alluring British actress Lena Headey. There is even a scene in a rippling corn field borrowed from "Gladiator".

At the end of the day, what makes the movie are the thrilling fight sequences with encounters in which the film is slowed down and then speeded up to give a video-game quality that is unlike anything you have previously seen on the big screen. Whem a sword slashes or a spear lungs or an arrow whistles, you really feel and hear it. At times, it is as if a picture by Hieronymus Bosch had come to life."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":763533,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.6},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Drama"],"datePublished":"2007-03-28","keywords":"spartan,battle,warrior,greece,battle of thermopylae","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"300","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi213123353","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmQxYmYwZGUtZGZhNS00Y2U5LTk2Y2EtM2VmZDRhOTcwODdmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYmQxYmYwZGUtZGZhNS00Y2U5LTk2Y2EtM2VmZDRhOTcwODdmXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Home Video Trailer from Warner Bros. Pictures"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0124930/","name":"Gerard Butler"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0372176/","name":"Lena Headey"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0920992/","name":"David Wenham"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0811583/","name":"Zack Snyder"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0002663/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0159111/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0167271/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0811583/","name":"Zack Snyder"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0426500/","name":"Kurt Johnstad"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1290582/","name":"Michael B. Gordon"}],"duration":"PT1H57M"}</script><metacontent="

Shrek and Fiona travel to the Kingdom of Far Far Away, where Fiona's parents are King and Queen, to celebrate their marriage. When they arrive, they find they are not as welcome as they thought they would be." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0298148/","name":"Shrek 2","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDJhMGRjN2QtNDUxYy00NGM3LThjNGQtMmZiZTRhNjM4YzUxL2ltYWdlL2ltYWdlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyMTQxNzMzNDI@._V1_.jpg","description":"Shrek and Fiona travel to the Kingdom of Far Far Away, where Fiona's parents are King and Queen, to celebrate their marriage. When they arrive, they find they are not as welcome as they thought they would be.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0298148/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"dfranzen70"},"dateCreated":"2004-11-08","inLanguage":"English","name":"More Shrekervescence!","reviewBody":"I know what you're expecting me to say. "If you liked Shrek ..." And it's so true. Fans of the first will be ga-ga over the second. The gang at Dreamworks was smart enough not to monkey around with a winning formula, so you have all the wit and charm of Shrek (Mike Myers), Fiona (Cameron Diaz), Donkey (Eddie Murphy), and all the fantastic fairy-tale creatures.

At the beginning of 2, Shrek and Fiona have been invited by Fiona's parents (John Cleese and Julie Andrews) to the family castle. Imagine their surprise when the honeymooning ogres show up! Seems the king and queen haven't heard that a) Fiona's an ogre and b) that her husband is one, too. Naturally, this doesn't sit particularly well with the king, and soon he's hired a hit man - Puss in Boots, no less, voiced by Antonio Banderas - to bump off his new son in law. Meanwhile, a Fairy Godmother (Jennifer Saunders) offers help to Fiona. And quickly, the main question of the film - conveniently, it was the main question of the first film - is whether love conquers all. Oh, perhaps it's a bit more complex than that - perhaps it's whether Fiona would love Shrek, no matter what he looked like. Come to think of it, that was the theme of the first one as well. 

Shrek and Fiona journey to the land of Far, Far Away, where the stuffy king and the queen mum live. Far, Far Away is a clear knockoff of Hollywood itself (complete with the sign on the mountain), and the journey includes a pass through what looks like Beverly Hills. The attention to detail is marvelous, as always.

As with 1, 2 drops all sorts of Disney references, most resulting in full-out belly laughter. I was in stitches, although perhaps - just perhaps - some of the humor will zoom over your tiny tot's tiny head.

Shrek 2 is a beautifully done movie, perhaps even more entertaining than the original. Sure, at the end you know your emotions have been manipulated somewhat, but in the end you really don't care. Outstanding voice performances, flawless animation, and a crisp, moderately adult (but not mature, definitely not mature) script reign supreme.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":441517,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.2},"contentRating":"PG","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2004-08-04","keywords":"reference to spider man,ogre,cat,princess,puss in boots","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Shrek 2","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1447231513","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGRhNGQwNjUtYmFlMS00ODdiLWI3YTUtNjViOWYzZmU2YzhjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZGRhNGQwNjUtYmFlMS00ODdiLWI3YTUtNjViOWYzZmU2YzhjXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Theatrical Trailer from Dreamworks"},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000196/","name":"Mike Myers"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000552/","name":"Eddie Murphy"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000139/","name":"Cameron Diaz"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0011470/","name":"Andrew Adamson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0038432/","name":"Kelly Asbury"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0970447/","name":"Conrad Vernon"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0819670/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0069464/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0129164/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0825308/","name":"William Steig"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0011470/","name":"Andrew Adamson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0830294/","name":"Joe Stillman"}],"duration":"PT1H33M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Wonder Woman 1984
programme.desc: U WONDER WOMAN 1984, sudbina svijeta još jedanput je na kocki, a samo ga Wonder Woman može spasiti. Nova priča zatječe Dianu Prince kako neprimjetno živi među smrtnicima u živahnim, elegantnim... U WONDER WOMAN 1984, sudbina svijeta još jedanput je na kocki, a samo ga Wonder Woman može spasiti. Nova priča zatječe Dianu Prince kako neprimjetno živi među smrtnicima u živahnim, elegantnim 1980-ima - eri hedonizma i želje za posjedovanjem. Iako je u potpunosti razvila svoje moći, ona ostaje pritajena, bavi se prikupljanjem drevnih artefakta, a herojska djela izvodi samo potajno. Međutim, Diana će uskoro morati skupiti svu svoju snagu, mudrost i hrabrost kad se sukobi s Maxwellom Lordom i Cheetom, zlikovkom koja posjeduje nadljudsku snagu i spretnost.

programme.title: الصراع المميت
Mortal Kombat
programme.desc: الصراع المميت: Directed by Simon McQuoid. With Lewis Tan, Jessica McNamee, Josh Lawson, Joe Taslim. MMA fighter Cole Young seeks out Earth's greatest champions in order to stand against the enemies of Outworld in a high stakes battle for the universe." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0293429/","name":"Mortal Kombat","alternateName":"الصراع المميت","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BY2ZlNWIxODMtN2YwZi00ZjNmLWIyN2UtZTFkYmZkNDQyNTAyXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyODkzNTgxMDg@._V1_.jpg","description":"MMA fighter Cole Young seeks out Earth's greatest champions in order to stand against the enemies of Outworld in a high stakes battle for the universe.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0293429/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"viantyara"},"dateCreated":"2021-04-20","inLanguage":"English","name":"Fun, gory but could be better!","reviewBody":"I don't really play Mortal Kombat or even follow the concept behind it. But even so, I enjoyed this movie. The fighting choreography is top notch! The costume, the cgi is also worth the hype. I love that they decided to make it rated R. But there's also some things that bothered me, like some bad cinematography, cheesy dialogues, and the somehow boring protagonist. The act 3 of the movie really felt rushed like the writers only had 5 minutes left to finish the script. I hope the sequel will have a better act 3.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":155279,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.1},"contentRating":"R","genre":["Action","Adventure","Fantasy"],"datePublished":"2021-04-23","keywords":"based on video game,gore,graphic violence,reboot,two word title","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4226400281","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjNjMTdkNjUtNzRmNi00ZTZjLTgzMDUtNzBhNTVmODUwM2QxXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjNjMTdkNjUtNzRmNi00ZTZjLTgzMDUtNzBhNTVmODUwM2QxXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFybm8@._V1_.jpg","description":"MMA fighter Cole Young seeks out Earth's greatest champions in order to stand against the enemies of Outworld in a high stakes battle for the universe."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1167985/","name":"Lewis Tan"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2537621/","name":"Jessica McNamee"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0493257/","name":"Josh Lawson"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2585406/","name":"Simon McQuoid"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0046718/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0504531/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0163543/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3859643/","name":"Greg Russo"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1709264/","name":"Dave Callaham"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm3349927/","name":"Oren Uziel"}],"duration":"PT1H50M"}</script><metacontent="
